Reviews.Title: “Good experience”

Reviews.Content: stayed time hotel 3 nights 2nd floor quiet staff wonderful enjoyed buffet breakfasta pleasant stay taxi front customer service stay clean hotelgreat bath etc

Reviews.Title: “Great spa”
Reviews.Author: ThanosRubis
Reviews.Content: hotel brand nice amenities breakfast wifi fast parking hotel 200 metres difficult costs 20 lira day receptionist girl helpful hotel spa pool heated turkish bath nice sauna hammam free charge hotel touristic night little scary tram near metro
